content:
Hi all, please reach out if you have any questions on this year's final DevDays! :wave:

A few pointers to information out there:

  • Answers to Frequently Asked Questions :grey_question:
  • Speakers guidelines and help or in #DevDays Speaker Support (PM if you're a speaker and don't have access yet) :speaker:
  • PDF of the schedule and the links to more information on the Let's Build a FHIR Spec/App tracks :calendar:

Hi! I just signed up for the FhirDevDays and as this is our first visit to this kind of conference I have a question. If I have a very specific question (e.g. how do I best map our internal model to FHIR object XXXX), what is the best way to go about this? In what forum should I post this type of question?
@H책kan MacLean Welcome! And Jose is right, #implementers is the best starting place for any FHIR implementtain question. And people will point you to more specific channels if needed from there.
Hi - I have a question about the Live Showcase link. I've added one to my Exhibitor and Sponsor pages but the link is not appearing on either. Is there something else i have to do?

Manny Veiga said:

Hi - I have a question about the Live Showcase link. I've added one to my Exhibitor and Sponsor pages but the link is not appearing on either. Is there something else i have to do?

Let me check, as I at this stage, I cannot see the links either.

Where did you add it, as on the backend side, I did not see it.

I just re-uploaded and it appears to work now. Thanks for the help!
Hi! I'm having trouble finding "FHIR CarePlan Driven Capture of Quality Data" today at 14.25 in the Agenda on Whova? Has it been removed?
Yes @H책kan MacLean , that presentation was cancelled.
